name: Rodrigo Fraga Silva
note:
Fresh Results
Company Name: Comphya SA
Company Website:  https://comphya.com/

Contact Person: Rodrigo Araujo Fraga da Silva

Product:   Comphya is a Swiss medical device company, spin-off from the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology (EPFL). Its mission is to overcome the major clinical problems of erectile dysfunction (ED) in spinal cord injury and post-prostatectomy patients (non-responders to oral drugs). Their innovation lies on neuroprosthetics principles and will offer a unique and superior treatment for ED. Their goal is to fulfill patient needs through safe and effective medical devices, offering life quality in large parts of the male population in great need


Immediate Requirements:  content marketer to do posting for branding to target investors, to do nice sketching, professional images, graphics, he/she should know how to work with WordPress.
Country-Location: Switzerland

Target Audience:  worldwide
Next Step:  send information of our company, CVs of candidates with portfolio, then we will decide on the interview (27/05/2021)

Компания занимается разработкой нейросимулятора для лечения эректильной дисфункции у пациентов с повреждениями спинного мозга и после простатэктомии. Их инновации основаны на принципах нейропротезирования. В команде на данный момент 4 человека. Раннее не сотрудничали с удалёнными сотрудниками. Нужен будет ВА в Декабре. Отправила письмо с презентацией и рекомендациями других компаний. Фолоу ап на декабрь 2020. 

Fresh results : I have reminded a client about our company and services.(04.02.2021)

client_candidates.comment: design for website and for social media

need_candidates.comment_requirements:
Affiliate Manager
We are offering a unique opportunity for non-experienced but passionate and highly motivated candidates, to join one of the leading companies in the online  industry.
 Key Responsibilities:
- Hunt for, acquire, and negotiate deals with new affiliates
-Day to day support of affiliates-daily management, maintenance and service.
- Initiate promotions to maximize affiliates activities. 
-Manage negotiations with the affiliates regarding renewal of conditions.
-Maximize affiliate's profits while encouraging the broadening of their activities (initiate ideas for new campaigns, incentives and bonuses).
- Ongoing monitoring of the affiliates performance analysis, aiming to improve processes and initiate actions to increasing potential income.
- Provide online marketing tools in order to increase the traffic of players.
Requirements: 
- Sales orientation & experience (preferably in the online market).
-Ability to work with strict deadlines and under pressure
-Ability to work in a fast-paced, collaborative and dynamic environment.
-English at a high level.
-Familiarity with the web world.

need_candidates.comment_requirements:
Good morning Julia,
 sorry for the late response. We have discussed the topic intensively. I think it would be too early for the small task at the moment, also because the task could probably be solved within 8 hours and we have to book at least 20 hours. As we don't yet know exactly when we could take up the remaining hours, we would wait until we are a bit more advanced with our project and could then fully get started with you. I would still like to stay in contact with you, as this point in time will most likely come this year. 
As already mentioned, we are currently building up a large farm, which takes a lot of time and we need to reach a certain level before we start new projects, otherwise we will be in over our heads. 

We will come back to you in November and of course hope to be able to use your services.
Best regards
Alex
ot could be an option to hire a recruiter but not in this year

name: James Ewin
note:
RESULT

Company Name: ORCA
 
Company Website: http://www.onlyorca.com
Contact Person: James Ewin
Product: ORCA is a full service creative agency based in Bristol, UK. They create experiences which spark a positive impact on the world, for brands that they admire and products that inspire. They work with the bold, the brave, the challengers and the disruptors. They are here to start a movement, by creating challenger brands with a strong mindset and even stronger identity.
Country-Location: UK
Specialties: Graphic Design, Illustration, Branding, Typography, Web Design, Logo Design, Brand Development, Brand Exposure, Content Creation, Social Media Management, Corporate Naming, Logo Design, Web Development, Packaging Design, Copywriting, Editorial Design, UI & UX, Packaging Design, and Digital Design
Target Audience: worldwide 
Immediate Requirement: James looks for PHP developers, Front-end delovelopers (they have their own CMS), someone who can work with liquids, maybe some Shopify. 
Next Step: Send information about our company, send some CVs of suitable candidates, send references (UK and some other countries), schedule an interview on Tuesday, 15 at 13.00
Next Contact Date: keep in touch by email, Interview on Tuesday, 15

In the long running of their Office, they aim to offer their services with professionalism and consistency. name: David Shuster
note:
Hi Vlada,
Thanks for reaching out. I'd like to learn more.

Result
Company Name: Managed IT Experts Ltd
Company Website:  http://www.manageditexperts.co.uk/

Contact Person: Mihai Arsene

Product: They offer Office 365 and Dynamics 365 CRM development as well as outsourced IT support services to businesses and charities. It ranges from minimising our IT downtime to modernising our workplace and helping us become more productive and gain other significant business advantages. 


Specialties:  business IT Support and Solutions, Cloud Solutions, Office 365 migrations, Network and Server support, Charity IT Support Specialist, Dynamics 365, Dynamics 365 CRM, Managed Service Provider, Cyber Security, Business Continuity and Disaster Recovery, Business IT consultancy, Azure Cloud, Team Collaboration Solutions, Fully Managed IT Support, Cloud migrations, Technical Support, IT Management, IT Services, Business Applications, Tech support, CRM, Exchange Online, SharePoint Online, Skype for Business, Azure, Teams, and OneDrive

Immediate Requirements:    graphic and funnel designers (web), content and seo marketers, back-end developer in Dripro, sales representative

Country-Location:  Romania

Target Audience:   worldwide

Next Step:  send information of our company, candidates CVs, Mihai will email job description to us

Next contact date: keep in touch by email
